title: Can't find my recordings
body: I can't find the highlight folder, and when I use this link C:\Users\\Documents\League of Legends\Highlights. I just get an error

replies.body: Did you create a highlight first? You must launch into a replay from inside the Beta client in your match history (hit the download button next to the match you want, then hit the new button that replaces it to launch into the replay). Once you've launched into the replay, you can record a portion of the match which will be saved as a *highlight* that you can later find in the directory you mentioned in your post.
I dont have a replay file to bigin with and I went through the normal procedure even made  a highlight a while back but not the entire folder is gone and nothing happens when I record again.

Did you replace <user name> with the name of the account you use on your computer?

For example, my profile is Hudaphuq so it would be "C:\Users\Hudaphuq\Documents\League of Legends\Highlights"
Alternatively, just go to My Documents>League of Legends>Highlights or Replays.
